list.name: Veg Home Food Combo
list.description: 🎀Wholesome, 🍛🥗🍚 homemade-style vegetarian meal, perfect for gatherings. Includes Bagara rice, white rice, Parmannam, Tomato Pachadi, Aalu Tomato, Curry Kothimeera Pachadi, curd, and sweet—cooked fresh with minimal oil and spices. Tastes just like home! 🍛🍽️

outlet.cuisines: Flavorful feasts for 30-100 guests, prepared by Hyderabad’s skilled home chefs and traditional bawarchis, delivered ready for your party.
